impact_weight: The implementation of GHG reduction targets in the transportation sector can aid the development of net-zero technology for road vehicles, as it creates an incentive for the adoption of low-carbon technologies.
justification: The report highlights the importance of reducing GHG emissions in the transportation sector, which can be achieved through the development of net-zero technologies.

impact_weight: The reduction of GHG emissions can enable the development of biofuels as a low-carbon alternative for transportation, creating conditions for further growth in the sector.
justification: The report mentions the potential of biofuels in reducing GHG emissions, which can contribute to the achievement of climate targets.

impact_weight: The implementation of GHG reduction targets in the transportation sector can aid the development of net-zero technology for maritime transport, as it creates an incentive for the adoption of low-carbon technologies.
justification: The report highlights the importance of reducing GHG emissions in the transportation sector, which can be achieved through the development of net-zero technologies for maritime transport.

impact_weight: The development of hydrogen distribution infrastructure can enable the use of hydrogen as a low-carbon energy carrier, which can contribute to the removal of GHG emissions.
justification: The report mentions the potential of hydrogen in reducing GHG emissions, which can contribute to the achievement of climate targets.

impact_weight: The implementation of GHG reduction targets in the building sector can aid the development of net-zero technology for buildings, as it creates an incentive for the adoption of low-carbon technologies.
justification: The report highlights the importance of reducing GHG emissions in the building sector, which can be achieved through the development of net-zero technologies.

impact_weight: The development of climate-resilient infrastructure can enable the creation of sustainable urban mobility systems, which can contribute to reducing GHG emissions.
justification: The report mentions the importance of climate resilience in achieving sustainable development, which can be linked to the development of urban mobility systems.
